archimate:Capability.name: Sales Strategy & Planning
archimate:Capability.documentation: Execute customer and market potential analysis, target customers, define go-to-market strategies, develop strategies and policies for prospecting and retention of customers, define trade marketing strategies, define service levels by segments / channels. Create sales forecasting, develop business plans with customers, simulate scenarios of product mix optimization and sales allocation, create tactical sales plans, define portfolio by market and plan sales goals and executions.
